sen.j: 坂東 薪水（ばんどう しんすい）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Shinsui BANDO was a Kabuki actor.
Shinsui BANDO was a name used by Kabuki actors.
sen.cmt: 複数名いるため、a Kabuki actor→a name used by Kabuki actorsとしました。
sen.e: Shinsui BANDO was a name used by Kabuki actors.

sen.j: 坂東彦三郎家に由緒ある名前。
sen.e: The name was originated in the Hikosaburo BANDO family.
The name was originated in the Hikosaburo BANDO family.
The name was originated in the Hikosaburo BANDO family.

sen.j: - 坂東彦三郎 (初代)の俳名。
sen.e: Shinsui BANDO was haimyo (a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) of Hikosaburo BANDO the first.
